The movie: Angels with Filthy Souls" was created solely for the film "Home Alone" and is not a real movie.
The cinematographer and production desig: 3. The actors, Ralph Foody and Michael Guido, portrayed their characters in an exaggerated, larger-than-life style, reminiscent of classic gangster films.
The title of the fictional movie: Angels with Filthy Souls," was inspired by the 1938 James Cagney movie "Angels with Dirty Faces."
